alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Hall (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 12:30AM CDT until July 12 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... West central Hall County in south central Nebraska... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1229 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Ravenna, or 21 miles west of Grand Island, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Shelton, but mainly rural areas between Wood River and Ravenna. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
